body: Check these examples on Hydra: [WaterCube](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Render_Water_Cube_with_Honeybee&slide=0&scale=2.2973967099940715&offset=-370.5816409998612,-35.76017579567406) and [Mesh](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Perforated_mesh&slide=0&scale=4.000000000000003&offset=-542.9640165532237,-1189.6770786472998)
